comment: Please, I beg the Puppy Town gods to give me Lucille and five minutes with this evil monster in a locked room someday.
amr:
# ::snt Please, I beg the Puppy Town gods to give me Lucille and five minutes with this evil monster in a locked room someday.
(b / beg-01
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (g / god
            :mod (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Puppy"
                        :op2 "Town")))
      :ARG2 (g2 / give-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Lucille"))
                  :op2 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 5
                        :unit (m / minute))
                  :accompanier (m2 / monster
                        :mod (e / evil)
                        :mod (t2 / this))
                  :location (r / room
                        :ARG1-of (l / lock-01)))
            :ARG2 ii
            :time (s / someday)))
